name: GreedGems
title: Greed
rules: ԍGems

name: GreedJewelry
title: Greed
rules: ԍJewelry

name: GreedPearls
title: Greed
rules: ԍPearls

name: GreedTrinkets
title: Greed
rules: ԍTrinkets

name: GreedCoins
title: Greed
rules: ԍCoins

name: Admire
title: Admire
rule1: If there is only 1 worker on this card, Gain 2 treasures
rule2: If there is only 1 worker on this card, Swap 2 treasures
rule3: If there is only 1 worker on this card, Lose 2 treasures

name: Bribe
title: Bribe
rule2: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure

name: Cajole
title: Cajole
rules: Gain a treasure

name: Decieve
title: Decieve
rule2: Gain a Treasure, Swap a treasure

name: Entertain
title: Entertain
rule1: Gain 1 treasure per worker already on this card
rule2: Swap 1 treasure per worker already on this card
rule3: Lose 1 treasure per worker already on this card

name: Flirt
title: Flirt
rule1: If there is only 1 worker on this card, Gain 2 treasures
rule3: If this card is full of workers, Lose 2 treasures

name: Gripe
title: Gripe
rule1: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure
rule2: Lose a coin, Swap a treasure
rule3: Lose a coin, Lose a treasure

name: Hoodwink
title: Hoodwink
rule2: Swap a treasure for a coin

name: Jeer
title: Jeer
rules: If there is only one worker on this card, Lose a treasure, otherwise Gain a treasure.

name: Kowtow
title: Kowtow
rules: Lose a treasure

name: Menace
title: Menace
rule1: Take a treasure from another player
rule2: Swap a treasure with another player

name: Negotiate
title: Negotiate
rules: Trade a treasure with another player

name: Orate
title: Orate
rule1: Gain 1 treasure per empty slot on this card
rule2: Swap 1 treasure per empty slot on this card
rule3: Lose 1 treasure per empty slot on this card

name: Quibble
title: Quibble
rules: Swap a treasure

name: Rage
title: Rage
rule1: Gain 1 coin per worker on this card
rule2: Gain 1 coin per worker already on this card
rule3: Lose 1 coin per worker on this card

name: Trick
title: Trick
rule1: Gain a coin, Gain a treasure
rule2: Gain a coin, Swap a treasure
rule3: Gain a coin, Lose a treasure

name: Yell
title: Yell
rule1: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure
rule2: Lose a coin, Swap a treasure
rule3: Lose a coin, Lose a treasure

name: c1
rules: When you Gain a treasure, you may pay a player 2 coins to Gain it from that player instead of the Captain.
title: Trevyn

name: c2
rules: When you Gain coins, Gain an extra coin.
title: Sophia

name: c3
rules: When the game ends, Gain an extra treasure from the Captain's hoard.
title: Andrew

name: c5
rules: When you swap treasures you may swap 2 instead of 1.
title: Erin

name: c9
rules: You may pay 3 coins to change which of the revealed Greeds are the active Greed.
title: Dan

name: c11
rules: If you have the most coins at the end of the game, gain 5 extra points.
title: James

name: c12
rules: When you swap a treasure, you may pay a player 1 coin to swap a treasure with that player instead of the Captain.
title: Taylor

name: c15
rules: If you have no coins, you may Gain a coin as part of any action.
title: Berrett

name: c17
rules: When you count treasures for the purpose of determining who gets shot, you are treated as having 2 fewer treasures.
title: Dustin

name: c19
rules: Your gold coins are worth 3 points each at the end of the game.
title: Isabella
